remarks: Define a function that maps a group operation to the group's identity element.  (Contributed by FL, 5-Feb-2010.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 15-Dec-2013.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
df-gid $p |- GId = ( g e. _V |-> ( iota_ u e. ran g A. x e. ran g ( ( u g x ) = x /\ ( x g u ) = x ) ) ) $.
$d g u x $.
